21  from imusim.platforms.adcs import ADC 
22  from imusim.platforms.timers import Timer 
23  from imusim.behaviours.timing import VirtualTimer 
24  from imusim.platforms.sensors import Sensor

26 -class PeriodicSampler(object): 

27      """ 
28      Takes samples at regular intervals. 
29      """ 
30   

31 -    def __init__(self, adc, sensors, timer, period, handler): 

32          """ 
33          Initialise sampler. 
34   
35          The first sample will be taken after one period has elapsed. 
36   
37          @param adc: L{ADC} to sample with. 
38          @param sensors: List of L{Sensor}s to sample. 
39          @param timer: L{Timer} or L{VirtualTimer}to use for timing. 
40          @param period: Interval between samples. 
41          @param handler: Function to call on each sample. The sampled 
42              values will be passed as arguments in the same order as the 
43              list of sensors passed to this constructor. 
44          """ 
45          self._adc = adc 
46          self._sensors = sensors 
47          self._period = period 
48          self._handler = handler 
49   
50          self._timer = timer 
51   
52          timer.callback = self._timerHandler 
53          timer.start(period, repeat=True) 

54   

55 -    def _timerHandler(self): 

56          self._adc.startSample(self._handler, *self._sensors)
